europeana:record.dc:title: Revision of the subtribe Monoctonina Mackauer sensu stricto (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Aphidiinae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Aphidiinae; Harkeria; Paramonoctonus; Monoctonus; Quadrictonus; keys; Palaearctic; Nearctic; Holarctic
europeana:record.dc:description: A key to the genera of the subtribe Monoctonina Mackauer, 1961 s.s. and keys to the species of the genus Harkeria Cameron, 1900 and the European species of the genus Monoctonus Haliday, 1833 are given. Two new species of Monoctonus are described from The Netherlands. The subgenus Paramonoctonus Starý, 1959 is synonymized with the subgenus Harkeria Cameron. A generic diagnosis is given for each of the genera Harkeria, Monoctonus and Quadrictonus Starý & Remaudière, 1982.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revision of the subtribe Monoctonina Mackauer sensu stricto (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Aphidiinae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 63) (Issue 1)
